taxonomicnotes: The taxonomy of Congochromis dimidiatus needs to be reviewed. The distribution is probably more restricted.
rationale: The species is widespread without major threats throughout central Africa and is assessed as Least Concern. It has also been assessed as Least Concern as part of the Central Africa regional assessment. Within Western Africa it is categorised as Vulnerable, as it has a restricted distribution and its habitat is threatened by agricultural practices.
assessor: Bousso, T., Lalèyè, P. & Moelants, T.
evaluator: Snoeks, J., Tweddle, D., Getahun, A., Lalèyè, P., Paugy, D., Zaiss, R., Fishar, M.R.A & Brooks, E.
